IF(WIN)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/far)
		##DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## https://sourceforge.net/projects/findandreplace/files/findandreplace/2.0.2/FAR-2.0.2-win.zip/download
		##DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/Tools/FAR-2.0.2-win.zip)
		##DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/FAR-2.0.2-win.zip ${3RDPARTY})
		DKINSTALL(https://sourceforge.net/projects/findandreplace/files/findandreplace/2.0.2/FAR-2.0.2-win.zip far)
	ENDIF()

	DKSET(FAR ${3RDPARTY}/far)
ENDIF()
